languages.text: "Я был свидетелем ваших деяний, прославляющих Бога-Императора, и верю, что вы используете власть Патента праведно. Но то, что вы собираетесь сделать — немыслимо… И вы хотите, чтобы я рискнул всем — своей честью, жизнью и будущим десятины". {n}Проктор замолкает, буравя вас взглядом.{/n} "Тем не менее, именем Лекс Империалис, я санкционирую ваше решение. Остается только молиться, чтобы остальные Арбитес увидели в вас то, что вижу я — истинн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Его".

"I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."
languages.original_text: "Я был свидетелем ваших деяний, прославляющих Бога-Императора, и верю, что вы используете власть Патента праведно. Но то, что вы собираетесь сделать — немыслимо… И вы хотите, чтобы я рискнул всем — своей честью, жизнью и будущим десятины". {n}Проктор замолкает, буравя вас взглядом.{/n} "Тем не менее, именем Лекс Империалис, я санкционирую ваше решение. Остается только молиться, чтобы остальные Арбитес увидели в вас то, что вижу я — истинн{mf|ого|ую} слугу Его".

languages.text: "Ich habe Eure Taten zu Ehren des Gottimperators gesehen und glaube, Ihr setzt die Macht des Handelsbriefs gerecht ein ... aber was Ihr vorhabt, ist undenkbar ... Außerdem müsste ich alles aufs Spiel setzen: meine Ehre, mein Leben, ja selbst die Zukunft des Zehnts." {n}Solomorne verstummt und lässt seinen Blick auf dir ruhen.{/n} "Nichtsdestotrotz autorisiere ich Eure Entscheidung hiermit im Namen des Lex Imperia. Jetzt können wir nur noch beten, dass der Rest der Arbites dasselbe in Euch sieht wie ich: {mf|Einen loyalen Diener|Eine loyale Dienerin} und {mf|wahren Vollstrecker|wahre Vollstreckerin} Seines Willens."
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

Jetzt können wir nur noch beten, dass der Rest der Arbites dasselbe in Euch sieht wie ich: {mf|Einen loyalen Diener|Eine loyale Dienerin} und {mf|wahren Vollstrecker|wahre Vollstreckerin} Seines Willens."

languages.text: « Je vous ai {mf|vu|vue} à maintes reprises honorer l'Empereur-Dieu à travers vos actes et j'estime que vous utilisez le pouvoir de la lettre de marque à juste raison, mais ce que vous vous apprêtez à faire est tout bonnement impensable... Qui plus est, vous voudriez que je risque tout : mon honneur, ma vie et l'avenir de la dîme. » {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant en vous regardant droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, au nom de la Lex Imperialis, j'autorise votre décision. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à prier pour que le reste de l'Arbites vous voie de la même manière que moi : comme {mf|un fidèle serviteur|une fidèle servante} de l'Empereur qui ne cherche qu'à exécuter Sa volonté. »
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

Qui plus est, vous voudriez que je risque tout : mon honneur, ma vie et l'avenir de la dîme. » {n}Solomorne s'interrompt un instant en vous regardant droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Quoi qu'il en soit, au nom de la Lex Imperialis, j'autorise votre décision. Il ne nous reste plus qu'à prier pour que le reste de l'Arbites vous voie de la même manière que moi : comme {mf|un fidèle serviteur|une fidèle servante} de l'Empereur qui ne cherche qu'à exécuter Sa volonté. »

languages.text: “我亲眼目睹了你以神皇的名义做出的善举，我也相信你公正地行使了神圣授状赋予你的权力。不过，你接下来要做的事情，恐怕超出了所有人的想象……而且，你想让我赌上我所有的一切：我的命运、我的性命，以及什一税的未来。”{n}索罗蒙安静下来，目光紧盯着你。{/n}“不过，我愿意以帝国法典的名义，在此正式承认你的决定。接下来能做的事情，恐怕就只有祈祷了。我希望其他法务官能以看待我的方式看待你，相信你是帝皇真正的忠仆，凡事遵循祂的旨意。”
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

traits.locale_text: “我亲眼目睹了你以神皇的名义做出的善举，我也相信你公正地行使了神圣授状赋予你的权力。不过，你接下来要做的事情，恐怕超出了所有人的想象……而且，你想让我赌上我所有的一切：我的命运、我的性命，以及什一税的未来。”{n}索罗蒙安静下来，目光紧盯着你。{/n}“不过，我愿意以帝国法典的名义，在此正式承认你的决定。接下来能做的事情，恐怕就只有祈祷了。我希望其他法务官能以看待我的方式看待你，相信你是帝皇真正的忠仆，凡事遵循祂的旨意。”

languages.text: «He presenciado actos suyos que honran al Diezmo, y creo que ejerce el poder de la Patente con justicia... pero lo que está a punto de hacer es inimaginable... y me obligaría a arriesgarlo todo: mi honor, mi vida y el destino mismo del diezmo». {n}Solomorne guarda silencio y te clava la mirada.{/n} «Sin embargo, en nombre de la Lex Imperialis, autorizo su decisión. Tan solo nos queda rezar para que el resto del Arbites vea en usted la misma persona que veo yo: un{mf||a} sirviente leal y un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} emisari{mf|o|a} de Su voluntad».
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

traits.locale_text: «He presenciado actos suyos que honran al Diezmo, y creo que ejerce el poder de la Patente con justicia... pero lo que está a punto de hacer es inimaginable... y me obligaría a arriesgarlo todo: mi honor, mi vida y el destino mismo del diezmo». {n}Solomorne guarda silencio y te clava la mirada.{/n} «Sin embargo, en nombre de la Lex Imperialis, autorizo su decisión. Tan solo nos queda rezar para que el resto del Arbites vea en usted la misma persona que veo yo: un{mf||a} sirviente leal y un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} emisari{mf|o|a} de Su voluntad».

languages.text: 「あなたが神帝陛下を讃える行いを目の当たりにし、令状の権力を正当に行使していると信じています。ですが、あなたがこれから行おうとしていることはありえません…そして、あなたは私にすべてを賭けさせようとしています。私の名誉、命、そして租税の未来そのものを」{n}ソロモーンは沈黙し、あなたをじっと見つめた。{/n}「それでも、レックス・インペリアの名において、私はここにあなたの決断を承認します。あとは他のアービトレイターたちが、私と同じようにあなたを忠実な奉仕者、そして陛下のご意思の真の伝達者として認めることを祈るだけです」
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'u onurlandıran eylemlerinize tanık oldum ve Ruhsatname'nin gücünü adil bir şekilde kullandığınıza inanıyorum. Ancak yapmak üzere olduğunuz şey akılalmaz... Üstelik benden her şeyi; onurumu, hayatımı ve aşarın geleceğini tehlikeye atmamı istiyorsunuz." {n}Solomorne, susup bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Yine de Lex İmperialis adına kararınızı onaylıyorum. Geriye bir tek, diğer Arbites mensuplarının sizi benim gördüğüm gibi görmesi için dua etmek kalıyor: Sadık bir hizmetkâr ve O'nun iradesinin gerçek bir aracısı olarak."
languages.original_text: "I have witnessed your deeds that honour the God-Emperor, and I believe that you exercise the power of the Warrant justly — but what you are about to do is unthinkable... And you would have me risk everything: my honour, my life, and the very future of the tithe." {n}Solomorne falls silent and fixes you with his gaze.{/n} "Nevertheless, in the name of the Lex Imperialis, I hereby authorise your decision. All that remains is to pray that the rest of the Arbites see you for the same person I do: a loyal servant and a true conduit of His will."

Üstelik benden her şeyi; onurumu, hayatımı ve aşarın geleceğini tehlikeye atmamı istiyorsunuz." {n}Solomorne, susup bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Yine de Lex İmperialis adına kararınızı onaylıyorum. Geriye bir tek, diğer Arbites mensuplarının sizi benim gördüğüm gibi görmesi için dua etmek kalıyor: Sadık bir hizmetkâr ve O'nun iradesinin gerçek bir aracısı olarak."
